about_the_game:
Our brave goat has to face a new task. The challenge will be even more difficult than before and only with your help will she be able to overcome it!

Overview


-New map
A new map (plus a remixed version) has been added to the game, and with it new mechanics, including special switches that unlock passages or new platforms that disappear on impact.



-Unlocking levels
In Goat's Tale 2 Plus, you don't have to go through the game from scratch to enjoy all the maps, from the beginning of the adventure the player has access to all the maps!

Goat's Tale 2 Plus includes:


  • Even more adventures

  • Even more challenges

  • Even more choices
